input.sentences: a great big statue in the middle of the street .
the same statue with pretty lights on it .
a beautiful ferris wheel with lights on it .
the iffel tower with a light on the top of it .

output.sentences: A beautiful statue lights up the night.
The light shining on the statue brightens up the night.
The ferris wheel night reflects in the dark water.
The Eiffel tower lights up the night.
